text: "Santa Monica" is a 1998 song by Australian pop duo Savage Garden and is the seventh single from their 1997 self-titled debut studio album. It was released on 21 November 1998 as a single in Japan. == Track listing == # "Santa Monica" (album version) – 3:37 # "Santa Monica" (Bittersweet Mix) – 5:00 # "Santa Monica" (live at the Hard Rock Cafe) – 3:42 == References == Category:1998 songs Category:Savage Garden songs
title: Santa Monica (Savage Garden song)
